mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_message_management where delete_status=0 and enable=1 and content_type=#{contentType} and effect_time <= now() and (failure_time >= now() or failure_time is null) AND id NOT in ( SELECT message_id from sys_message_user where user_id=#{userId} and delete_message=1 ) ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT a.id messageId FROM sys_message_management a where a.delete_status=0 and a.enable=1 and a.content_type=#{contentType} and ( (a.target_object =1 and find_in_set(#{userAccount},a.user_account)>0)
OR (a.target_object =2 and find_in_set(#{item},a.hierarchy_ids)>0)
OR a.target_object =3) and a.id NOT in ( SELECT message_id from sys_message_user WHERE user_id=#{userId})
SELECT count(1) FROM sys_message_user b where b.delete_status=0 and b.content_type=#{contentType} and b.user_id=#{userId} AND IFNULL(b.delete_message,0)=0 AND IFNULL(b.`status`,0)=0

select id from sys_message_management where delete_status=0 and id in
#{item}
